verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When a <S%H120>man<s%> shall have in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> a <S%H7613>rising<s%>, or a <S%H5597>scab<s%>, or a bright <S%H934>spot<s%>, and it become in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>, then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, or unto <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: and if the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on <S%H2930>him<s%>, and pronounce him unclean.

And if the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> thereof be not <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> thereof be not <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: <S%H5869>and<s%>, behold, if in his eyes the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be at a <S%H5975>stay<s%>, and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him <S%H8145>again<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; <S%H5061>and<s%>, behold, if the plague be <S%H3544>dim<s%>, and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>: it is a <S%H4556>scab<s%>: and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

But if the <S%H4556>scab<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that he hath <S%H7200>showed<s%> himself to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%>, he shall <S%H7200>show<s%> himself to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H8145>again<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>; <S%H7200>and<s%>, behold, if the <S%H4556>scab<s%> be spread in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.
When the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is in a <S%H120>man<s%>, then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>; <S%H3836>and<s%>, behold, if there be a white <S%H7613>rising<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and it have <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, and there be <S%H4241>quick<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H7613>rising<s%>,

it is an <S%H3462>old<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: he shall not <S%H5462>shut<s%> him <S%H2931>up<s%>, for he is unclean.

And if the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> break <S%H6524>out<s%> <S%H6524>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> all the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of him that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> from his <S%H7218>head<s%> even to his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, as far as <S%H4758>appeareth<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>; <S%H6883>and<s%>, behold, if the leprosy have <S%H3680>covered<s%> all his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, he shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%>: it is all <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>: he is <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
But <S%H3117>whensoever<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7200>appeareth<s%> in <S%H2930>him<s%>, he shall be unclean.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.
Or if the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> turn <S%H7725>again<s%>, and be <S%H2015>changed<s%> unto <S%H3836>white<s%>, then he shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on <S%H5061>him<s%>; and, behold, if the plague be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H3836>white<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%>: he is <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
And when the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> hath <S%H3588>in<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> thereof a <S%H7822>boil<s%>, and it is <S%H7495>healed<s%>,

and in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7822>boil<s%> there is a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H7613>rising<s%>, or a bright <S%H934>spot<s%>, <S%H125>reddish<s%> - <S%H3836>white<s%>, then is shall be <S%H7200>showed<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>; <S%H4758>and<s%>, behold, if the appearance thereof be <S%H8217>lower<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> thereof be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>, it hath <S%H6524>broken<s%> out in the <S%H7822>boil<s%>.

But if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on <S%H3836>it<s%>, and, behold, there be no white <S%H8181>hairs<s%> <S%H8217>therein<s%>, and it be not lower than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, but be <S%H3544>dim<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:
And if it <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is a <S%H5061>plague<s%>.

But if the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> in its <S%H6581>place<s%>, and be not spread, it is the <S%H6867>scar<s%> of the <S%H7822>boil<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

Or when the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> hath in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> thereof a <S%H4348>burning<s%> by <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H4241>quick<s%> flesh of the <S%H4348>burning<s%> become a <S%H3836>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%>, <S%H125>reddish-white<s%>, or <S%H3836>white<s%>;

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon <S%H8181>it<s%>; and, behold, if the hair in the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> thereof be <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>; it is <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>, it hath <S%H6524>broken<s%> out in the <S%H4348>burning<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.

But if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on <S%H3836>it<s%>, and, behold, there be no white <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the bright <S%H934>spot<s%>, and it be no <S%H8217>lower<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, but be <S%H3544>dim<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon him the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: if it <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.

And if the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> in its <S%H6581>place<s%>, and be not spread in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, but be <S%H3544>dim<s%>; it is the <S%H7613>rising<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>: for it is the <S%H6867>scar<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning<s%>.
And when a <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman<s%> hath a <S%H5061>plague<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> or upon the <S%H2206>beard<s%>,

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look on the <S%H5061>plague<s%>; <S%H7200>and<s%>, behold, if the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> thereof be <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and there be in it <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is a <S%H5424>scall<s%>, it is <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> or of the <S%H2206>beard<s%>.

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of the <S%H5424>scall<s%>, <S%H4758>and<s%>, behold, the appearance thereof be not <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and there be no <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in <S%H3548>it<s%>, then the priest shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of the <S%H5424>scall<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%>; <S%H5424>and<s%>, behold, if the scall be not <S%H6581>spread<s%>, and there be in it no <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%>, and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H5424>scall<s%> be not <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>,

then he shall be <S%H1548>shaven<s%>, but the <S%H5424>scall<s%> shall he not <S%H1548>shave<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that hath the <S%H5424>scall<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%>:

and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5424>scall<s%>; <S%H5424>and<s%>, behold, if the scall be not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> thereof be not <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>: and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.
But if the <S%H5424>scall<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%>,

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on <S%H5424>him<s%>; and, behold, if the scall be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall not <S%H1239>seek<s%> for the <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%>; he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

But if in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> the <S%H5424>scall<s%> be at a <S%H5975>stay<s%>, and <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> be <S%H6779>grown<s%> up <S%H5424>therein<s%>; the scall is <S%H7495>healed<s%>, he is <S%H2889>clean<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
And when a <S%H376>man<s%> or a <S%H802>woman<s%> hath in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> bright <S%H934>spots<s%>, even <S%H3836>white<s%> bright <S%H934>spots<s%>;

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>; <S%H934>and<s%>, behold, if the bright spots in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be of a <S%H3544>dull<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, it is a <S%H933>tetter<s%>, it hath <S%H6524>broken<s%> out in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>; he is <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
And if a <S%H376>man<s%>'s hair be <S%H4803>fallen<s%> off his <S%H7218>head<s%>, he is <S%H7142>bald<s%>; yet is he <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
And if his hair be <S%H4803>fallen<s%> off from the front <S%H6285>part<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%>, he is forehead <S%H1371>bald<s%>; yet is he <S%H2889>clean<s%>.

But if there be in the bald <S%H7146>head<s%>, or the bald <S%H1372>forehead<s%>, a <S%H125>reddish<s%> - <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H5061>plague<s%>; it is <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>breaking<s%> out in his bald <S%H7146>head<s%>, or his bald <S%H1372>forehead<s%>.

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon <S%H7613>him<s%>; and, behold, if the rising of the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H125>reddish<s%> - <S%H3836>white<s%> in his bald <S%H7146>head<s%>, or in his bald <S%H1372>forehead<s%>, as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>;

he is a <S%H6879>leprous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>: the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall surely pronounce <S%H2930>him<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; his <S%H5061>plague<s%> is in his <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And the <S%H6879>leper<s%> in whom the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H899>is<s%>, his clothes shall be <S%H6533>rent<s%>, and the hair of his <S%H7218>head<s%> shall go <S%H6544>loose<s%>, and he shall <S%H5844>cover<s%> his upper <S%H8222>lip<s%>, and shall <S%H7121>cry<s%>, <S%H2931>Unclean<s%>, <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

All the <S%H3117>days<s%> wherein the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is in him he shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; he is <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%>; <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> shall his dwelling <S%H4186>be<s%>.
The <S%H899>garment<s%> also that the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is <S%H6785>in<s%>, whether it be a woollen <S%H899>garment<s%>, or a <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garment<s%>;
whether it be in <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or <S%H6154>woof<s%>; of <S%H6593>linen<s%>, or of <S%H6785>woollen<s%>; whether in a <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or in anything <S%H4399>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>;

if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H3422>greenish<s%> or <S%H125>reddish<s%> in the <S%H899>garment<s%>, or in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or in the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or in <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>; it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>, and shall be <S%H7200>showed<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon the <S%H5061>plague<s%>, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> up that which hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

and he shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H899>garment<s%>, either in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or in the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, whatever <S%H4399>service<s%> <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H6213>used<s%> <S%H5061>for<s%>; the plague is a <S%H3992>fretting<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>; it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

And he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H899>garment<s%>, whether the <S%H8359>warp<s%> or the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, in <S%H6785>woollen<s%> or in <S%H6593>linen<s%>, or <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>, wherein the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H3992>is<s%>: for it is a fretting <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>; it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>, <S%H5061>and<s%>, behold, the plague be not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H899>garment<s%>, <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>;

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H3526>wash<s%> the thing wherein the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H5462>is<s%>, and he shall shut it up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H3526>washed<s%>; <S%H5061>and<s%>, behold, if the plague have not <S%H2015>changed<s%> its <S%H5869>color<s%>, and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread<s%>, it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>; thou shalt <S%H8313>burn<s%> it in the <S%H784>fire<s%>: it is a <S%H6356>fret<s%>, whether the bareness be <S%H7146>within<s%> or <S%H1372>without<s%>.

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%>, <S%H5061>and<s%>, behold, the plague be <S%H3544>dim<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3526>washing<s%> <S%H7167>thereof<s%>, then he shall rend it out of the <S%H899>garment<s%>, or out of the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or out of the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or out of the <S%H6154>woof<s%>:

and if it <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> in the <S%H899>garment<s%>, either in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or in the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or in <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>, it is <S%H6524>breaking<s%> <S%H8313>out<s%>: thou shalt burn that wherein the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And the <S%H899>garment<s%>, either the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or whatsoever <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%> it <S%H3526>be<s%>, which thou shalt wash, if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H3526>them<s%>, then it shall be washed the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2891>time<s%>, and shall be clean.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in a <S%H899>garment<s%> of <S%H6785>woollen<s%> or <S%H6593>linen<s%>, either in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or <S%H3627>anything<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>, to pronounce it <S%H2891>clean<s%>, or to pronounce it <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.
